title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen
description: When I choose SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, it beeps. This behavior seems unexpected and incorrect.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, I don't hear any sound.
EB: I hear a Windows 'ding' sound when I choose SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText (the bell sound that indicates an error).
SR:
1. Launch the ControlExample application.
2. Navigate to the ControlExampleText section.
3. Choose the SWT.MULTI option.
4. Observe the bell sound.
